attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is being over run by Political Correctness. The latest is over a police ad with a dog sitting in a police hat.

It is time for the government to take action to protect the majority instead of bowing to minorities for fear of offending them. 
  We need common sense and reality!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
